project.name: C-C196A-SUBV-03-ST01-DT02-DF15-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C196A-SUBV-03-ST01-DT02-DF15-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository This weakness reads a number to be used as a loop counter. The loop counter is initially read as an unsigned long, then converted to an int. If the number read in is larger than MAX_UINT, it is silently converted to a negative number. This breaks the loop counter logic, resulting in an infinite loop. Good inputs: taint source is 2147483647 or less Bad inputs: taint source is 2147483648 or greater

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

If the number read in is larger than MAX_UINT, it is silently converted to a negative number. This breaks the loop counter logic, resulting in an infinite loop. Good inputs: taint source is 2147483647 or less Bad inputs: taint source is 2147483648 or greater

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C196A-SUBV-03-ST01-DT02-DF15-CF23-01-BAD-01

process.script: printf "Cleanup pattern repeated $(grep -E """^evaluating input$""" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) times\n"

SS_TC_TEMPFILE="$(mktemp)" && grep -vE "^evaluating input$" "../logfile.txt" > "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" && rm "../logfile.txt" && mv "$SS_TC_TEMPFILE" "../logfile.txt" && printf "Cleaned pattern from logfile.\n"

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_4CfHIFRDwvUnmfiMHgbv AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_W6aK2pecyc OR (NOT finished_j4WZRTcvRa AND NOT (controlled_exit_QU7owbaKRj OR continued_execution_C4Jgi32VkT)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_W6aK2pecyc OR (NOT finished_j4WZRTcvRa AND NOT (controlled_exit_QU7owbaKRj OR continued_execution_C4Jgi32VkT))))))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_W6aK2pecyc OR (NOT finished_j4WZRTcvRa AND NOT (controlled_exit_QU7owbaKRj OR continued_execution_C4Jgi32VkT)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_W6aK2pecyc OR (NOT finished_j4WZRTcvRa AND NOT (controlled_exit_QU7owbaKRj OR continued_execution_C4Jgi32VkT)))))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "../logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
